# ğŸ‰ FileManager v2.0.0 Released!

We're excited to announce the release of **FileManager v2.0.0** - a major upgrade with significant performance improvements and architectural enhancements!

## ğŸš€ What's New

### Performance
- **10x faster file operations** with Rust FFI integration
- **50% reduced memory footprint**
- **Improved concurrency** for better multi-threaded performance

### Architecture
- Complete rewrite of core operations in Rust
- Modular design for better maintainability
- Enhanced error handling and recovery

### Features
- New web interface mode
- Advanced search capabilities
- Batch operation improvements
- Better cross-platform support

## ğŸ“¥ Get v2 Now

### Snap Users (Automatic Update)
```bash
sudo snap refresh filemanager
```

### New Installation
```bash
sudo snap install filemanager
```

### Manual Installation
Download from [Releases](https://github.com/devonionrouting4Moses/fileManager/releases/tag/v2.0.0)
